headline20: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 9 airports right now.
management45: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 9 airports right now. No engine anti-ice operations are currently flagged. Across base airports: 4 critical, 14 high, 11 medium, 10 normal. Key bases needing attention include Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR), Chişinău (RMO/LUKK) and Iaşi (IAS/LRIA); plus 15 other bases. 11 additional base airports are at medium severity and should be monitored closely. At base airports, the dominant pattern is snow-related runway contamination risk, low cloud base and mist  — most notably around Iaşi (IAS/LRIA), Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD) and Modlin (WMI/EPMO). Network hotspots: Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO), Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH), Billund (BLL/EKBI), Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD), Modlin (WMI/EPMO) and 4 others. Primary drivers: mist, low cloud base and cold‑temperature performance penalties. Expected impact is reduced runway capacity with higher delay and diversion risk, especially where visibility/RVR and cloud base are very low. Since the last update, 12 airports changed status, led by Vilnius (VNO/EYVI), Almaty (ALA/UAAA), Lamezia Terme Sant'Eufemia (SUF/LICA) and 9 others.
detail90: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 9 airports right now. Base airports (focus): Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 400 m, cloud base around 100 ft; forecast below approach minima at times | Chişinău (RMO/LUKK) — HIGH: mist; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties | Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) — CRIT: mist; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties | Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 600 m, cloud base around 100 ft; forecast below approach minima at times | Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 150 m, cloud base around 100 ft; forecast below approach minima at times | Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties and 12 others. Worst affected now: Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO) — CRIT: mist; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, mist, snow/blowing snow) | Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: approach minima limits, runway contamination / reduced braking, low ceilings) | Billund (BLL/EKBI) — CRIT: mist; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings, mist) | Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: runway visual range (RVR) constraints, cold-temperature performance penalties, very low visibility) | Modlin (WMI/EPMO) — CRIT: fog; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: runway visual range (RVR) constraints, runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties) | Olsztyn-Mazury (SZY/EPSY) — CRIT: freezing fog; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: runway visual range (RVR) constraints, approach minima limits, crosswind limitations) and 3 others. Changed since last run: Vilnius (VNO/EYVI), Almaty (ALA/UAAA), Lamezia Terme Sant'Eufemia (SUF/LICA), Lennart Meri Tallinn (TLL/EETN), Kaunas (KUN/EYKA), Milan Malpensa (MXP/LIMC), Treviso Antonio Canova (TSF/LIPH), Verona Villafranca Valerio Catullo (VRN/LIPX), Venice Marco Polo (VCE/LIPZ), Václav Havel Airport Prague (PRG/LKPR) and 2 others.
